channel.title: Cheddr - Cheddr [Album]
channel.description:
Wow, Auxy has come a long way (and so have I tbh) I released this 12 track album on various platforms in the last several months.
Just uploaded it to Soundcloud. https://soundcloud.com/cheddr/sets/cheddr
Best sound quality is on Bandcamp http://cheddr.bandcamp.com or Youtube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeMbqbkLYvfo8fviHtU96GA Purchase it at bandcamp if you are so inclined, no pressure. Heck contact me and I'll give you a download code if you like.
Track 1 has amazing vocals by Austin, TX team Eric C. Powell and Andrea Powell (https://ecpmusic.cc/). Vocals recorded and mixed external to Auxy. Otherwise all tracks were 100% produced with Auxy.
It took me over a year to produce these songs to the point where I was satisfied. If I exported this to Midi, there would be 60-70,000 notes in this album. Crazy to think about it that way. This is no, on session beats album. I put my heart and soul in it.
*Track list* I'm on My Way (feat Eric C. Powell and Andrea Powell) Stone Cold Signals and Shadows Letters from Camp Pt 1 Letters from Camp Pt 2 Center City Thirty Six Oh Five Half Moon A-Town Alleys and Allies Sky Blue Pink I'm on My Way (Album Instrumental)
Some day I'll tell the stories about these song titles. lol.
Also available at all your favorite streaming sites. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeMbqbkLYvfo8fviHtU96GA https://open.spotify.com/album/3K80n33sTkZ98OYnD9xc29 https://music.apple.com/us/album/cheddr/1521081306
Other credits: Album Art: freddarguello on Fiverr Distribution: Distrokid Mastering: post Auxy for free at Bandlab.

item.title: Cheddr - Cheddr [Album]
item.dc:creator: Cheddr
item.description:
Wow, Auxy has come a long way (and so have I tbh)
I released this 12 track album on various platforms in the last several months.

Just uploaded it to Soundcloud.
https://soundcloud.com/cheddr/sets/cheddr

Best sound quality is on Bandcamp http://cheddr.bandcamp.com or Youtube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeMbqbkLYvfo8fviHtU96GA
Purchase it at bandcamp if you are so inclined, no pressure. Heck contact me and I’ll give you a download code if you like.

Track 1 has amazing vocals by Austin, TX team Eric C. Powell and Andrea Powell (https://ecpmusic.cc/). Vocals recorded and mixed external to Auxy. Otherwise all tracks were 100% produced with Auxy.

It took me over a year to produce these songs to the point where I was satisfied. If I exported this to Midi, there would be 60-70,000 notes in this album. Crazy to think about it that way. This is no, on session beats album. I put my heart and soul in it.

Track list
I’m on My Way (feat Eric C. Powell and Andrea Powell)
Stone Cold
Signals and Shadows
Letters from Camp Pt 1
Letters from Camp Pt 2
Center City
Thirty Six Oh Five
Half Moon
A-Town
Alleys and Allies
Sky Blue Pink
I’m on My Way (Album Instrumental)

Some day I’ll tell the stories about these song titles. lol.

Also available at all your favorite streaming sites.

YouTube

Star Splitter Records

Purchase Cheddr music (including current releases) at https://cheddr.bandcamp.com/
